headline: Wealthy Parents Have Turned Into Banks for Their Children. Why That’s a Problem.
summary: Over a third of parents in an Amerprise survey say they’re concerned that supporting their children into adulthood will impair their retirements.

raw.headline: Wealthy Parents Have Turned Into Banks for Their Children. Why That’s a Problem.
raw.summary: Over a third of parents in an Amerprise survey say they’re concerned that supporting their children into adulthood will impair their retirements.

headline: McDonald's is bringing back Monopoly — analyst sees a menu of upside
summary: The iconic Monopoly promotion could lift McDonald's traffic and app downloads while rebuilding customer loyalty, Jefferies says.

raw.headline: McDonald's is bringing back Monopoly — analyst sees a menu of upside
raw.summary: The iconic Monopoly promotion could lift McDonald's traffic and app downloads while rebuilding customer loyalty, Jefferies says.

headline: McDonald’s has created a chief data, analytics, AI officer role
summary: Das Dasgupta, a former Starbucks executive, will serve in the new role, while Emily Reasor has also been named the chain’s new chief strategy officer

raw.headline: McDonald’s has created a chief data, analytics, AI officer role
raw.summary: Das Dasgupta, a former Starbucks executive, will serve in the new role, while Emily Reasor has also been named the chain’s new chief strategy officer

headline: McDonald's bringing back Monopoly promotion: Consumer breakdown
summary: McDonald's (MCD) will be bringing back its peel-and-play Monopoly game next week, a promotion that hasn't been seen in over 10 years. PNC Asset Management Group CIO Amanda Agati and Yahoo Finance senior reporters Brooke DiPalma and Ines Ferré assess how big a value and traffic driver this will be for the fast-food chain. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Jeep® Brand Turns MONOPOLY Money Into $500 Toward a Grand Cherokee and Chance to Win the SUV in the MONOPOLY Game at McDonald's
summary: Now through Nov. 3, Jeep brand launches MONOPOLY Bonus Cash Allowance program, where customers can bring $500 in MONOPOLY play money into dealerships to apply toward a new 2025 Jeep® Grand Cherokee
